article_title: Editorial: The Stevens Center: Private funds should carry load in renovation
article_text:
Thank you for reading 12 free articles on our site. og.description: As the jewel of Winston-Salem’s well-regarded arts culture, the Stevens Center deserves to be updated and remodeled, but the majority of the estimated $30 million it will cost should come from private sources.
